verses.verse: וַיָּ֡קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up אֶלְיָשִׁיב֩ <S%H475><s%> Then Eliashib הַכֹּהֵ֨ן <S%H3548><s%> priest הַגָּד֜וֹל <S%H1419><s%> the high וְאֶחָ֣יו <S%H251><s%> with his brethren הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests וַיִּבְנוּ֙ <S%H1129><s%> and they builded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> the sheep הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they קִדְּשׁ֔וּהוּ <S%H6942><s%> they sanctified וַֽיַּעֲמִ֖ידוּ <S%H5975><s%> it and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֑יו <S%H1817><s%> the doors וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מִגְדַּ֤ל <S%H4026><s%> of it even unto the tower הַמֵּאָה֙ <S%H3968><s%> of Meah קִדְּשׁ֔וּהוּ <S%H6942><s%> they sanctified עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against מִגְדַּ֥ל <S%H4026><s%> it unto the tower חֲנַנְאֵֽל׃ <S%H2606><s%> of Hananeel ס

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יָד֥וֹ <S%H3027><s%> And next unto him בָנ֖וּ <S%H1129><s%> builded אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> the men יְרֵח֑וֹ <S%H3405><s%> of Jericho ס וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יָד֣וֹ <S%H3027><s%> Next בָנָ֔ה <S%H1129><s%> And next to them builded זַכּ֖וּר <S%H2139><s%> Zaccur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אִמְרִֽי׃ <S%H566><s%> of Imri ס

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַדָּגִ֔ים <S%H1709><s%> But the fish בָּנ֖וּ <S%H1129><s%> build בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> did the sons הַסְּנָאָ֑ה <S%H5570><s%> of Hassenaah הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they קֵר֔וּהוּ <S%H7136><s%> who [also] laid the beams וַֽיַּעֲמִ֙ידוּ֙ <S%H5975><s%> thereof and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <S%H1817><s%> the doors מַנְעוּלָ֖יו <S%H4514><s%> thereof the locks וּבְרִיחָֽיו׃ <S%H1280><s%> thereof and the bars ס

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יָדָ֣ם <S%H3027><s%> And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֗יק <S%H2388><s%> repaired מְרֵמ֤וֹת <S%H4822><s%> Meremoth בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אוּרִיָּה֙ <S%H223><s%> of Urijah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הַקּ֔וֹץ <S%H6976><s%> of Koz ס וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יָדָ֣ם <S%H3027><s%> And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֔יק <S%H2388><s%> repaired מְשֻׁלָּ֥ם <S%H4918><s%> Meshullam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בֶּרֶכְיָ֖ה <S%H1296><s%> of Berechiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְשֵׁיזַבְאֵ֑ל <S%H4898><s%> of Meshezabeel ס וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יָדָ֣ם <S%H3027><s%> And next unto them הֶֽחֱזִ֔יק <S%H2388><s%> repaired צָד֖וֹק <S%H6659><s%> Zadok בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בַּעֲנָֽא׃ <S%H1195><s%> of Baana ס

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יָדָ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֣יקוּ <S%H2388><s%> repaired הַתְּקוֹעִ֑ים <S%H8621><s%> the Tekoites וְאַדִּֽירֵיהֶם֙ <S%H117><s%> but their nobles לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הֵבִ֣יאוּ <S%H935><s%> put צַוָּרָ֔ם <S%H6677><s%> not their necks בַּעֲבֹדַ֖ת <S%H5656><s%> to the work אֲדֹנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H113><s%> of their Lord ס

וְאֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> שַׁ֨עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַיְשָׁנָ֜ה <S%H3465><s%> Moreover the old הֶחֱזִ֗יקוּ <S%H2388><s%> repaired יֽוֹיָדָע֙ <S%H3111><s%> Jehoiada בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פָּסֵ֔חַ <S%H6454><s%> of Paseah וּמְשֻׁלָּ֖ם <S%H4918><s%> and Meshullam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בְּסֽוֹדְיָ֑ה <S%H1152><s%> of Besodeiah הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they קֵר֔וּהוּ <S%H7136><s%> they laid the beams וַֽיַּעֲמִ֙ידוּ֙ <S%H5975><s%> thereof and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <S%H1817><s%> the doors וּמַנְעֻלָ֖יו <S%H4514><s%> thereof and the locks וּבְרִיחָֽיו׃ <S%H1280><s%> thereof and the bars ס

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יָדָ֨ם <S%H3027><s%> And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֜יק <S%H2388><s%> repaired מְלַטְיָ֣ה <S%H4424><s%> Melatiah הַגִּבְעֹנִ֗י <S%H1393><s%> the Gibeonite וְיָדוֹן֙ <S%H3036><s%> and Jadon הַמֵּרֹ֣נֹתִ֔י <S%H4824><s%> the Meronothite אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> the men גִבְע֖וֹן <S%H1391><s%> of Gibeon וְהַמִּצְפָּ֑ה <S%H4709><s%> and of Mizpah לְכִסֵּ֕א <S%H3678><s%> unto the throne פַּחַ֖ת <S%H6346><s%> of the governor עֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> on this side הַנָּהָֽר׃ <S%H5104><s%> the river ס

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יָד֣וֹ <S%H3027><s%> Next unto him הֶחֱזִ֗יק <S%H2388><s%> repaired עֻזִּיאֵ֤ל <S%H5816><s%> Uzziel בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חַרְהֲיָה֙ <S%H2736><s%> of Harhaiah צֽוֹרְפִ֔ים <S%H6884><s%> of the goldsmiths ס וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יָד֣וֹ <S%H3027><s%> Next unto him הֶחֱזִ֔יק <S%H2388><s%> also repaired חֲנַנְיָ֖ה <S%H2608><s%> Hananiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הָרַקָּחִ֑ים <S%H7546><s%> of [one of] the apothecaries וַיַּֽעַזְבוּ֙ <S%H5800><s%> and they fortified יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> far הַחוֹמָ֥ה <S%H2346><s%> wall הָרְחָבָֽה׃ <S%H7342><s%> unto the broad ס

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Next יָדָ֤ם <S%H3027><s%> And next unto them הֶחֱזִיק֙ <S%H2388><s%> repaired רְפָיָ֣ה <S%H7509><s%> Rephaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son ח֔וּר <S%H2354><s%> of Hur שַׂ֕ר <S%H8269><s%> the ruler חֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> of the half פֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H6418><s%> part יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem ס

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יָדָ֧ם <S%H3027><s%> And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֛יק <S%H2388><s%> repaired יְדָיָ֥ה <S%H3042><s%> Jedaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֲרוּמַ֖ף <S%H2739><s%> of Harumaph וְנֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> opposite בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> even over against his house ס וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יָד֣וֹ <S%H3027><s%> And next unto him הֶחֱזִ֔יק <S%H2388><s%> repaired חַטּ֖וּשׁ <S%H2407><s%> Hattush בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֲשַׁבְנְיָֽה׃ <S%H2813><s%> of Hashabniah

מִדָּ֣ה <S%H4060><s%> piece שֵׁנִ֗ית <S%H8145><s%> the other הֶחֱזִיק֙ <S%H2388><s%> repaired מַלְכִּיָּ֣ה <S%H4441><s%> Malchijah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חָרִ֔ם <S%H2766><s%> of Harim וְחַשּׁ֖וּב <S%H2815><s%> and Hashub בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פַּחַ֣ת מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H6355><s%> of Pahathmoab וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מִגְדַּ֥ל <S%H4026><s%> and the tower הַתַּנּוּרִֽים׃ <S%H8574><s%> of the furnaces ס

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Next יָד֣וֹ <S%H3027><s%> And next unto him הֶחֱזִ֗יק <S%H2388><s%> repaired שַׁלּוּם֙ <S%H7967><s%> Shallum בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הַלּוֹחֵ֔שׁ <S%H3873><s%> of Halohesh שַׂ֕ר <S%H8269><s%> the ruler חֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> of the half פֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H6418><s%> part יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וּבְנוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1323><s%> he and his daughters ס

אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> שַׁ֨עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַגַּ֜יְא <S%H1516><s%> The valley הֶחֱזִ֣יק <S%H2388><s%> repaired חָנוּן֮ <S%H2586><s%> Hanun וְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> and the inhabitants זָנוֹחַ֒ <S%H2182><s%> of Zanoah הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> They בָנ֔וּהוּ <S%H1129><s%> they built וַֽיַּעֲמִ֙ידוּ֙ <S%H5975><s%> it and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <S%H1817><s%> the doors מַנְעֻלָ֖יו <S%H4514><s%> thereof the locks וּבְרִיחָ֑יו <S%H1280><s%> thereof and the bars וְאֶ֤לֶף <S%H505><s%> thereof and a thousand אַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> cubits בַּחוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> on the wall עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against שַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הָשֲׁפֽוֹת׃ <S%H830><s%> unto the dung

וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הָאַשְׁפּ֗וֹת <S%H830><s%> But the dung הֶחֱזִיק֙ <S%H2388><s%> repaired מַלְכִּיָּ֣ה <S%H4441><s%> Malchiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son רֵכָ֔ב <S%H7394><s%> of Rechab שַׂ֖ר <S%H8269><s%> the ruler פֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H6418><s%> of part בֵּית־ הַכָּ֑רֶם <S%H1021><s%> of Bethhaccerem ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יִבְנֶ֔נּוּ <S%H1129><s%> he built וְיַעֲמִיד֙ <S%H5975><s%> it and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <S%H1817><s%> the doors מַנְעֻלָ֖יו <S%H4514><s%> thereof the locks וּבְרִיחָֽיו׃ <S%H1280><s%> thereof and the bars ס

וְאֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> שַׁ֨עַר <S%H8179><s%> But the gate הָעַ֜יִן <S%H5869><s%> of the fountain הֶ֠חֱזִיק <S%H2388><s%> repaired שַׁלּ֣וּן <S%H7968><s%> Shallun בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son כָּל־ חֹזֶה֮ <S%H3626><s%> of Colhozeh שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> the ruler פֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H6418><s%> of part הַמִּצְפָּה֒ <S%H4709><s%> of Mizpah ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יִבְנֶ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H1129><s%> he built וִיטַֽלְלֶ֔נּוּ <S%H2926><s%> it and covered [וְיַעֲמִידוּ כ] (וְיַעֲמִיד֙ <S%H5975><s%> abide ק) דַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <S%H1817><s%> the doors מַנְעֻלָ֖יו <S%H4514><s%> thereof the locks וּבְרִיחָ֑יו <S%H1280><s%> thereof and the bars וְ֠אֵת <S%H853><s%> חוֹמַ֞ת <S%H2346><s%> thereof and the wall בְּרֵכַ֤ת <S%H1295><s%> of the pool הַשֶּׁ֙לַח֙ <S%H7975><s%> of Siloah לְגַן־ <S%H1588><s%> garden הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> by the king's וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far הַֽמַּעֲל֔וֹת <S%H4609><s%> and unto the stairs הַיּוֹרְד֖וֹת <S%H3381><s%> that go down מֵעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> from the city דָּוִֽיד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David ס

אַחֲרָ֤יו <S%H310><s%> After הֶחֱזִיק֙ <S%H2388><s%> him repaired נְחֶמְיָ֣ה <S%H5166><s%> Nehemiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַזְבּ֔וּק <S%H5802><s%> of Azbuk שַׂ֕ר <S%H8269><s%> the ruler חֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> of the half פֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H6418><s%> part בֵּֽית־ צ֑וּר <S%H1049><s%> of Bethzur עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far נֶ֙גֶד֙ <S%H5048><s%> opposite קִבְרֵ֣י <S%H6913><s%> unto [the place] over against the sepulchres דָוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> of David וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far הַבְּרֵכָה֙ <S%H1295><s%> and to the pool הָעֲשׂוּיָ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> that was made וְעַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> far בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and unto the house הַגִּבֹּרִֽים׃ <S%H1368><s%> of the mighty ס

אַחֲרָ֛יו <S%H310><s%> After הֶחֱזִ֥יקוּ <S%H2388><s%> him repaired הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites רְח֣וּם <S%H7348><s%> Rehum בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בָּנִ֑י <S%H1137><s%> of Bani עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יָד֣וֹ <S%H3027><s%> Next unto him הֶחֱזִ֗יק <S%H2388><s%> repaired חֲשַׁבְיָ֛ה <S%H2811><s%> Hashabiah שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> the ruler חֲצִי־ <S%H2677><s%> of the half פֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H6418><s%> part קְעִילָ֖ה <S%H7084><s%> of Keilah לְפִלְכּֽוֹ׃ <S%H6418><s%> in his part ס

אַחֲרָיו֙ <S%H310><s%> After הֶחֱזִ֣יקוּ <S%H2388><s%> him repaired אֲחֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H251><s%> their brethren בַּוַּ֖י <S%H942><s%> Bavai בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֵנָדָ֑ד <S%H2582><s%> of Henadad שַׂ֕ר <S%H8269><s%> the ruler חֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> of the half פֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H6418><s%> part קְעִילָֽה׃ <S%H7084><s%> of Keilah ס

וַיְחַזֵּ֨ק <S%H2388><s%> repaired עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Next יָד֜וֹ <S%H3027><s%> And next to him עֵ֧זֶר <S%H5829><s%> Ezer בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֵשׁ֛וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> of Jeshua שַׂ֥ר <S%H8269><s%> the ruler הַמִּצְפָּ֖ה <S%H4709><s%> of Mizpah מִדָּ֣ה <S%H4060><s%> piece שֵׁנִ֑ית <S%H8145><s%> another מִנֶּ֕גֶד <S%H5048><s%> front עֲלֹ֥ת <S%H5927><s%> over against the going up הַנֶּ֖שֶׁק <S%H5402><s%> to the armoury הַמִּקְצֹֽעַ׃ <S%H4740><s%> at the turning ס
